thread.title: Saudi Prince's visit will test French allegiances

title: Saudi Prince's visit will test French allegiances
text:
Saudi Prince's visit will test French allegiances 7:07am BST - 01:21 
When French President Emmanuel Macron flew into Riyadh for hastily arranged talks with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman in November it was all smiles in public, but in private a tough dialogue over Iran signalled a change between the allies. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
When French President Emmanuel Macron flew into Riyadh for hastily arranged talks with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman in November it was all smiles in public, but in private a tough dialogue over Iran signalled a change between the allies.
